title: Rogue Trader Availability Map
description: Schema for mapping roles to move IDs and their initial checked state

^[A-Za-z ]+$.description: A role name mapping to move availability

_movesFile.description: Path to the JSON file containing moves for this role

^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: Move ID mapped to its initial checked state (true = initially checked, false = initially unchecked)
